articles.author: Anuj Bhatia
articles.title: Google’s Head of Trust and Safety for Asia Pacific explains why it took time to rein in bad loan apps - The Indian Express
articles.description: Saikat Mitra, Vice President and Head of Trust and Safety for Asia-Pacific at Google explains why the company finds it difficult to control bad loan apps.
articles.content: “The reason it took us a while to handle loan apps was that they were not putting malware on people’s phones, nor did they have harmful content on the app. Instead, there were bad business practices … [+4108 chars]
